reg_pit.title: Sheriff Powers, Duties and Responsibilities Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions "exigent circumstances" and "police officer" were added by BC Reg 69/2019, effective April 1, 2019.
Section 2 (1) (g) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 27/2013, effective January 30, 2013.

paragraph.paragraphtext: protecting the safety of judges, crown counsel, witnesses, coroners, staff of administrative tribunals listed in the Schedule, employees of the Ministry of Attorney General and employees of the Ministry of Public Safety and Solicitor General outside a court facility;

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (g) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 100/2018, effective May 18, 2018.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: protecting the safety of judges, crown counsel, witnesses, coroners, staff of administrative tribunals listed in the Schedule, employees of the Ministry of Justice outside a court facility;

change.changenote: Section 3 was enacted by BC Reg 69/2019, effective April 1, 2019.
Section 4 was enacted by BC Reg 5/2023, effective January 24, 2023.
Section 5 was enacted by BC Reg 5/2023, effective January 24, 2023.
